programme.title: Love on the Danube: Royal Getaway
programme.desc: A jilted art gallery manager takes her honeymoon cruise solo and meets a charming prince posing as a European gentleman, who shares her passion for art.

programme.title: Love in the Clouds
programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's beau gives up a lucrative legal practice to become a circus clown.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia faces a moral dilemma when an ill friend asks for help in ending her life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche turns the tables and proposes to her brother-in-law.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's beau gives up a lucrative legal practice to become a circus clown.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia faces a moral dilemma when an ill friend asks for help in ending her life.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche turns the tables and proposes to her brother-in-law.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Angry listeners respond when Frasier's syndicated show forces a local radio legend (Bill Hayes) off the air; Daphne helps Martin with a furniture project. Joe Flaherty also guest stars.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier follows Roz to her family home in Wisconsin to pose as her boyfriend, while Niles plans to get rid of Daphne's frustrating mother (Millicent Martin).

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean suspects that the station's new intern was brought in to be her successor.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that Brock has been living secretly in the garage for several days to spend time apart from Barbra Jean.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba finds the perfect first home for Cheyenne and Van, but Cheyenne discovers that her high-school rival is selling it.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra tells Reba and Brock that she is postponing college to tour with her band; Cheyenne and Van cannot agree on how to decorate their new house.

programme.title: Napa Ever After
programme.desc: An attorney takes a sabbatical from her job to renovate a winery she inherits in Napa Valley. With the help of a handsome local, she learns more about the grandmother she hardly knew, while opening herself up to a love like she has never known.

programme.title: Autumn in the Vineyard
programme.desc: A man and woman with a strained history learn to trust each other when their dreams bring them together to turn a ranch into an award-winning winery.

programme.title: The Perfect Pairing
programme.desc: A food and wine critic falls for a single father after she bumps her head and loses her memory.

programme.title: Raise a Glass to Love
programme.desc: Aspiring master sommelier Jenna returns to her family vineyard to study and is intrigued by the natural methods of the handsome Argentinian winemaker Marcelo.

programme.title: Paris, Wine & Romance
programme.desc: Needing to win some accolades for her masterfully made pinots, a winemaker from Oregon travels to Paris to compete in a major wine competition.

programme.title: Love on the Danube: Royal Getaway
programme.desc: A jilted art gallery manager takes her honeymoon cruise solo and meets a charming prince posing as a European gentleman, who shares her passion for art.

programme.title: From Friend to Fiancé
programme.desc: Things get complicated when a woman's best friend from high school asks her to help plan his wedding to a girl that she secretly despises.

programme.title: Wedding Every Weekend
programme.desc: Nate and Brooke are going to the same four weddings for four weekends in a row. To avoid setups, they go together as wedding buddies. But what starts as a friendship soon becomes deeper.

programme.title: A Costa Rican Wedding
programme.desc: A clumsy maid of honor gets help from her handsome nemesis when things go awry at her best friend's Costa Rican wedding.

programme.title: Love at First Dance
programme.desc: Hope is tasked with teaching Manhattan's former most eligible bachelor how to dance for his extravagant wedding. As the dance lessons progress, complications ensue when feelings begin to develop between the student and the instructor.

programme.title: Ms. Matched
programme.desc: Despite differing viewpoints, a wedding planner and a financial adviser find out that they have more in common than they thought.

programme.title: Wedding Bells
programme.desc: When asked to be best man and maid of honor at a friend's wedding, two commitment-phobic professionals never expect that they're about to find romance of their own.

programme.title: My Boyfriend's Back: Wedding March 5
programme.desc: A young, ambitious wedding planner partners with Olivia to plan the perfect wedding. What she doesn't know is the groom's best man is none other than her ex-boyfriend, who she hasn't spoken to in five years.

programme.title: Bridal Wave
programme.desc: A woman planning for her wedding at a resort meets a charming local right before the ceremony and has to choose between the man who can care for her financially or the man who truly understands her.

programme.title: The Perfect Bride
programme.desc: Fitness instructor Molly runs the Bridal Boot Camp, helping prospective brides-to-be get in shape for the big day. Things get complicated when sparks start to fly between herself and Nick, the fiance of one of her new clients.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: Since Elizabeth, who is a down-to-earth high school teacher, and Donovan, a reserved New York businessman, are so different, their trip to the altar is lively and unpredictable.

programme.title: The Wedding Cottage
programme.desc: A woman must convince an uninspired artist to renovate a rundown cottage for a couple's dream wedding.

programme.title: A Country Wedding
programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Connie Britton, along with three experts in parenting, style, and home help single mothers create more balanced and fulfilling lives for themselves and their families.
